law.catch_line: Prohibition against sale or transfer of firearm to convicted felon.

text.section: No person shall knowingly sell or transfer a firearm to any person prohibited from possessing it by KRS 527.040.
Any person who violates the provisions of subsection (1) of this section is guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.
Any firearm transferred in violation of this section shall be subject to forfeiture and shall be disposed of pursuant to KRS 237.090.

law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 396, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1994.
